issue.title: [Rust] Fix test failure in CI code coverage
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rust code coverage in CI has been broken for a while now. We should fix it.
